title: Brash Boss
description: The roll of the dice,The flip of the cards,I love it all.The risk,The chance,The odds.Which is why I'm here again,In over my head,Drowning in debt,With no clear way out.But when a sexy, commanding boss makes me an offer.I can't refuse.After all,It can't be that hard being married to the Brash Boss. But deals struck over money should never involve the heart...
author: A.S. Roberts
